title: First Kill
description: Be the first player on your team to get a kill.

title: Double Kill
description: Eliminate 2 players within 5 seconds.

title: Team Kill
description: Get a team kill.

title: Ace Kill
description: Eliminate the last player required to get a Team kill.

title: Headshot Kill
description: Eliminate a player with a headshot.

title: Melee Kill
description: Eliminate a player with a melee hit.

title: Environmental Kill
description: Knock an enemy off the map or into environmental hazards.

title: Ultimate Kill
description: Eliminate a player with your Ultimate.

title: Damage Boost Kill
description: Eliminate a player while under a damage boost.

title: Objective Kill
description: Eliminate a player while on the objective.

title: Capture Objective
description: Capture an objective. (You must be on it when captured)

title: Objective Time
description: Spend at least 20 seconds on the objective at once.

title: Contest Objective
description: Contest the objective for at least 20 seconds at once.

title: Ultimate Denial
description: Stop/Cancel a hostile players ultimate.

title: 20 Elimiations
description: Get 20 Eliminations in a single match.

title: 20 Assists
description: Get 20 Assists in a single match.

title: 10 Kill-Streak
description: Get 10 Eliminations without dying in a single match.

title: 8k Damage
description: Deal 8000 damage in a single match.

title: 8k Heal
description: Deal 8000 heal in a single match.

title: 8k Mitigation
description: Mitigate 8000 damage in a single match.

title: Victory
description: Win a match.

title: Win Streak
description: Win 3 games in a row.

title: Lose Streak
description: Lose 3 games in a row. (f)

title: Quickplay Victory
description: Win a game of Quick Play.

title: 6v6 Victory
description: Win a game of 6v6.

title: Mystery Victory
description: Win a game of Mystery Heroes.

title: Stadium Victory
description: Win a game of Stadium.

title: No Limits Victory
description: Win a game of No Limits.

title: Deathmatch Victory
description: Win a game of Deathmatch.

title: Competative Victory
description: Win a game of Competative Overwatch.

title: Tank Win
description: Win a match as the Tank Role.

title: Damage Win
description: Win a match as the Damage Role.

title: Support Win
description: Win a match as the Support Role.

title: Early Leaver
description: Have a teammate or enemy leave before the game ends.

title: Targeted
description: Get solo ulted. (f)
